title: Fitness Routine for Busy People: Quick and Effective
body: I don't have much time to hit the gym, so I've been working out at home with quick routines. Here are some exercises that get results in less than 30 minutes. Who else has quick fitness tips?

title: How I Got Back into Fitness After a Long Break
body: After a few months of not working out, I finally got back into the groove with some simple home workouts. It wasn't easy, but it's definitely paying off. How do you stay motivated after a break?
